reviewText: Great for school. I watched this 24 times this year with my classes. This is good clean video for all ages. You don't have to pre-watch before.
Just as great as others in series. Wished there were DVDs for all the books!
Fun and active.  It will keep students attention very well.  It is short but it has great information.  its a good buy!

I was very disappointed the music was not credited on this DVD.  Manny Mendelson was credited, but song titles were not listed. I really wanted to know what the last Jazz song was that played during the credits.
